value.message: Route '/products/:id' may allow access to product details based solely on client-supplied id, risking IDOR if backend does not verify ownership.
value.suggestion: Ensure backend checks that the product id belongs to the current user and does not rely solely on client-supplied id for authorization.

value.message: Route '/profile/:userId' may expose user profiles based on client-supplied userId, risking IDOR if backend does not verify ownership.
value.suggestion: Verify on backend that the requested userId matches the authenticated user and restrict access if not.

value.message: Route 'orders/:id' may allow access to order details based solely on client-supplied id, risking IDOR if backend does not verify ownership.
value.suggestion: Ensure backend checks that the order id belongs to the current user and does not rely solely on client-supplied id for authorization.
